name: Email Spam Detection
description: Classify emails as spam or not spam based on content, sender, and metadata
features_description: Text features (TF-IDF), sender reputation, email metadata

name: Customer Churn Prediction
description: Predict whether a customer will leave the service in the next month
features_description: Usage patterns, demographics, billing history, support tickets

name: Disease Diagnosis from Symptoms
description: Classify patient disease based on reported symptoms and test results
features_description: Symptoms, vitals, lab test results, patient history

name: Sentiment Analysis of Product Reviews
description: Determine if product review sentiment is positive, neutral, or negative
features_description: Text embeddings, review length, rating score, verified purchase

name: Credit Card Fraud Detection
description: Identify fraudulent credit card transactions in real-time
features_description: Transaction amount, location, time, merchant type, user history

name: House Price Prediction
description: Estimate house sale price based on property characteristics and location
features_description: Square footage, bedrooms, location, age, amenities, neighborhood

name: Sales Forecasting
description: Predict next month product sales based on historical data and promotions
features_description: Historical sales, seasonality, promotions, holidays, competitor activity

name: Energy Demand Estimation
description: Forecast hourly electricity demand for grid management
features_description: Historical demand, temperature, humidity, day of week, hour, holidays

name: Temperature Prediction
description: Predict next day maximum temperature based on weather patterns
features_description: Historical temperatures, pressure, humidity, wind, cloud cover

name: Employee Salary Prediction
description: Estimate appropriate salary based on experience, skills, and role
features_description: Years of experience, education, skills, role level, location, company size

name: Customer Segmentation
description: Group customers into segments based on purchasing behavior
features_description: Purchase frequency, average order value, product categories, recency

name: Document Topic Clustering
description: Organize documents into topic groups for knowledge management
features_description: Document embeddings, keywords, metadata, author, date

name: Image Compression with PCA
description: Reduce image dimensionality while preserving important visual information

name: Network Anomaly Detection
description: Identify unusual network traffic patterns that might indicate attacks
features_description: Packet size, protocol, source/destination, timing, payload characteristics

name: Movie Recommendation System
description: Recommend movies to users based on viewing history and preferences
features_description: User ratings, viewing history, genres, similar user preferences
